SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.service

Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.service.ProjectService
@Path("/projects") public class ProjectService extends Object
ProjectService is a JAX-RS resource class that provides RESTful endpoints for managing projects, including creation, retrieval, updating, and approval of projects.

    • createProject

      @POST @Path("/create") @Consumes("application/json") public void createProject(@Valid @Valid ProjectCreateDto projectCreateDto, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws EntityNotFoundException, DuplicatedAttributeException, InputValidationException, UserNotFoundException, ElementAssociationException, UnknownHostException, DatabaseOperationException
      Creates a new project.
      Parameters:
      projectCreateDto - the project creation DTO.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the entity is not found.
      DuplicatedAttributeException - if the attribute is duplicated.
      InputValidationException - if there is an input validation error.
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      ElementAssociationException - if there is an element association error.
      UnknownHostException - if there is an unknown host exception.
      DatabaseOperationException - if there is a database operation error.

    • getFilteredProjects

      @GET @Path("/all/filter") @Produces("application/json") public ProjectPaginatedDto getFilteredProjects(@QueryParam("page") @DefaultValue("1") int page, @QueryParam("pageSize") @DefaultValue("8") int pageSize, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo) throws InputValidationException
      Retrieves filtered projects based on the query parameters.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number.
      pageSize - the size of the page.
      uriInfo - the URI info.
      Returns:
      a paginated DTO of filtered projects.
      Throws:
      InputValidationException - if there is an input validation error.
